description:
Made in collaboration with Adam Ondra for use in the Olympic games, this harness shaves the extram grams to not weigh you down on intense redpoints or at comps. The hipbelt and leg loops are made with a Dynex net that distributes loads and reduces pressure points, providing a comfortable and ultralight catch. Webbing rear gear loops and an elastic seat cord shed additional weight without sacrificing features.

  • Ultralight airNET technology distributes force while hanging
  • Bonded waist and leg loop edges are comfortable against skin
  • Seamless Infinity Belay Loop reduces wear points
  • Dynex tie in points for durability
  • Pressure molded front gear loops and webbing rear gear loops
  • Women's specific rise
name: Black Diamond airNET Harness - Women's
